mapper.sql: OFFSET (#{page}-1)*#{rows} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.select: /* wt478, POST, postMapper, selectPost */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AA.POST_NO) RNUM , (SELECT ISNULL(UPPER(TLI.DELETE_YN), 'N') FROM dbo.POSTLIKE TLI WHERE TLI.POST_NO = AA.POST_NO AND TLI.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND TLI.DELETE_YN = 'N') AS LIKE_FLAG , POST_NO , MEMBER_NO , CONTENT , STR_CREATED_DT , MEDIA_NO , (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM dbo.POSTLIKE TLI WHERE TLI.POST_NO = AA.POST_NO AND TLI.DELETE_YN = 'N') AS LIKE_CNT , LOGIN_ID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.comment AS TCO WHERE TCO.POST_NO = AA.POST_NO and TCO.delete_yn = 'N' ) AS COMMENT_CNT , (SELECT TME.FILENAME FROM dbo.media AS TME WHERE TME.MEDIA_NO = AA.MEDIA_NO ) AS FILENAME FROM( SELECT TPO.POST_NO , TPO.MEMBER_NO , TPO.CONTENT , format(TPO.CREATEDT, 'yyyy년 MM월 dd일 HH시 mm분') AS STR_CREATED_DT , TPO.MEDIA_NO , TMB.LOGIN_ID , TPO.CREATEDT FROM dbo.post AS TPO INNER JOIN dbo.member AS TMB ON TPO.MEMBER_NO = TMB.MEMBER_NO WHERE TPO.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND TMB.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AA

SELECT TPO.post_no , TPO.content , TPO.createdt , (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM dbo.POSTLIKE TLI WHERE POST_NO = ${postNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N') AS LIKE_CNT , (SELECT TMB.login_id FROM dbo.member AS TMB WHERE TMB.member_no = TPO.member_no ) AS login_id , (SELECT TME.filename FROM dbo.media AS TME WHERE TME.media_no = TPO.media_no ) AS filename FROM dbo.post AS TPO where post_no = #{postNo} AND TPO.delete_yn = 'N';

/* wt478, POST, postMapper, countPost */ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM dbo.post AS TPO INNER JOIN dbo.member AS TMB ON TPO.MEMBER_NO = TMB.MEMBER_NO WHERE TPO.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND TMB.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND TPO.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT TOP 9 P.post_no, M.filename, (SELECT COUNT(comment_no) FROM comment WHERE post_no = P.post_no AND delete_yn='N') cntComment FROM dbo.post P, dbo.media M WHERE P.media_no = M.media_no and P.member_no = #{memberNo} AND P.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY P.createdt DESC;
